text: Uye kumaThamood, takava tinotumira mukoma wavo Swaalih. Akati: “Imi vanhu vangu! Namatai Allah! Hamuna mumwe mwari kunze kwavo (Allah). Zvirokwazvo, kwave kunouya kwamuri chiratidzo chiri pachena (kubuda kwengamera hombe kubva mugomo) kubva kuna Tenzi venyu. Ngamera hadzi iyi yaAllah chiratidzo kwamuri. Nokudaro iregei ichifura munyika yaAllah, uye hamufaniri kuikanganisa, kana kuti mungangowanikwa nomutongo mukuru.”
